title.rendered: The Ultimate Admin Royal Rumble: 6 CRM Hacks, 1 Champion

content.rendered:
The Ultimate Admin Royal Rumble: 6 Crm Hacks, 1 Champion 2017

The Apttus Hack Battle at their Accelerate Summit. Three of us competed, we had 2 hacks each that we demoed for the audience.  They watched and voted for the winner.  The Competitors were the 2016 Champion Adam Olshansky, Guarev Kheterpal, and myself, Meighan Brodkey.  Our 6 hacks were to help admins and devs run jobs faster, shortcut to desired outcomes, upgrade your research capabilities and more. 



The Ultimate Admin Royal Rumble

Deck

View Deck



Video

Watch us battle it out!

Watch Now



Blog Post

Read about the adventure

Read Post
